Package worlds.gregs.hestia.game.plugins.region.systems

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicSystem  
    RegionBuilderSystem
    DynamicRegionBuilder Toolset to modify region maps Uses exact chunk coordinates, not local
    RegionCleanSystem
    Region Clean System Unloads regions which has no prioritised entities in Entities in this case refers to non-mob's (Players & bots)
    RegionPrioritySystem  
    RegionSystem  
    RegionsSystem
    RegionsSystem Keeps track of regions for easy access to a regions entity id
